text: Citadel Center is a 580ft (177m) tall skyscraper in Chicago, Illinois.http://www.emporis.com/en/wm/bu/?id=chasecenter-chicago-il-usa Emporis It was designed by Spanish architect Ricardo Bofill. Citadel Center is the 44th tallest building in Chicago. It was completed in 2003. It has 39 floors. The copy of the sculpture Winged Victory of Samothrace is on display in the lobby. ==Tenants== *Citadel LLC *Holland & Knighthttp://www.hklaw.com/offices/chicago Chicago Office of Holland & Knight LLP *Perkins Coie *Seyfarth Shaw ==References== ==Other websites== *Glass Steel and Stone Category:Skyscrapers in Chicago
title: Citadel Center
